markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout](/Spells.aspx?ID=817)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 69</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Calling out the fifth line of the Crimson Oath, you seal your most grievous injuries with a stroke of your blade. The first time each round that you Strike with your weapon and deal damage to a foe, you recover a number of HP equal to twice _shall not falter, shall not rout's_ level. This healing can't raise your current HP above half of your maximum HP.
name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout

text: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout Source Legends pg. 69 Cast Single Action verbal Duration 1 minute --- Calling out the fifth line of the Crimson Oath, you seal your most grievous injuries with a stroke of your blade. The first time each round that you Strike with your weapon and deal damage to a foe, you recover a number of HP equal to twice shall not falter, shall not rout's level. This healing can't raise your current HP above half of your maximum HP.
